body.p: An entity shall recognise the goods or services received or acquired in a share‑based payment transaction when it obtains the goods or as the services are received. The entity shall recognise a corresponding increase in equity if the goods or services were received in an equity‑settled share‑based payment transaction, or a liability if the goods or services were acquired in a cash‑settled share‑based payment transaction.
